summary: Major updates include OpenAI's new GPT-4.1 series and O3 reasoning models, Anthropic's Claude 4.5 Opus/Sonnet/Haiku models, and Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash/Pro with enhanced thinking capabilities.

models.name: GPT-4.1
models.description: Latest flagship model with enhanced reasoning and multimodal capabilities.
models.recommended_for: Complex reasoning, code generation, multimodal tasks

models.name: GPT-4.1 Mini
models.description: Faster, more affordable version of GPT-4.1 for everyday tasks.
models.recommended_for: General chat, quick analysis, cost-effective applications

highlights.cheapest_capable: gpt-4o-mini - Excellent multimodal capabilities at $0.15/$0.60 per 1M tokens
highlights.most_powerful: claude-opus-4-5-20251101 - Latest flagship with exceptional reasoning and 200K context
highlights.best_for_code: gpt-4.1 - Enhanced reasoning and coding capabilities with latest training
highlights.largest_context: gemini-2.5-flash - 1M+ token context window with thinking capabilities
